mapper.insert:
INSERT MEMBER (userid, account, agency1, agency2, agency3, agency4, balanceAladdin, balanceDari, balanceLadder, balanceLowhi, balancePower, bank, bankPassword, betZone, betZoneCnt, black, block, depositor, enabled, joinDate, joinIp, joinDomain, level, loginDate, loginIp, memo, money, nickname, password, phone, point, recommender, role, secession, passkey, joinCode, rateCode, rateShare, rateSports, rateZone, deposit, withdraw, betSports, betSportsCnt, loginCnt) VALUES
(#{user.userid}, #{user.account}, #{user.agency1}, #{user.agency2}, #{user.agency3}, #{user.agency4}, #{user.balance}, #{user.balance}, #{user.balance}, #{user.balance}, #{user.balance}, #{user.bank}, #{user.bankPassword}, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{user.depositor}, #{user.enabled}, #{user.joinDate}, #{user.joinIp}, #{user.joinDomain}, #{user.level}, #{user.loginDate}, #{user.loginIp}, #{user.memo}, #{user.money}, #{user.nickname}, #{user.password}, #{user.phone}, #{user.point}, #{user.recommender}, #{user.role}, #{user.secession}, #{user.phone}, #{user.joinCode}, #{user.rateCode}, #{user.rateShare}, #{user.rateSports}, #{user.rateZone}, #{user.deposit}, #{user.withdraw}, #{user.betSports}, #{user.betSportsCnt}, #{user.loginCnt})
